tool_description: Random words API provides you a list of random words or a single random word from a collection of over 35,000 words.

api_list.name: Get a random word
api_list.description: Returns a single random word from a list of more than 35,000 words. Important Note: *wordLength* must not be used with minLength and/or maxLength.

optional_parameters.name: beginsWith
optional_parameters.description: Filter words that begin with the specified string.

optional_parameters.name: endsWith
optional_parameters.description: Filter words that end with the specified string.

optional_parameters.name: excludes
optional_parameters.description: Exclude words that contain the specified string.

optional_parameters.name: includes
optional_parameters.description: Include words that contain the specified string.

api_list.name: Get multiple random words
api_list.description: Get multiple random words (minimum 2 and maximum 50) from a list of over 35,000 words. Important Notes: *count* must be a valid number between 2 and 50 (both included). *wordLength* must not be used with minLength and/or maxLength.

required_parameters.name: count
required_parameters.description: The number of random words to return, must be between 2 and 50.

optional_parameters.name: excludes
optional_parameters.description: Exclude words that contain the specified string.

optional_parameters.name: beginsWith
optional_parameters.description: Filter words that begin with the specified string.

optional_parameters.name: includes
optional_parameters.description: Include words that contain the specified string.

optional_parameters.name: endsWith
optional_parameters.description: Filter words that end with the specified string.
